function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential spread of Covid-19 through person-to-person contact","Impact":"Increase in the number of infected patients globally","Mitigation":"Implementing safety and precautionary measures","Technologies":"IoT for monitoring and enforcing safety guidelines","People":"General public, healthcare workers, essential workers","Owner":"Health organizations, government authorities"},{"Description":"Lack of control over the environment and workplace conditions","Impact":"Increased risk of contagion and transmission of Covid-19","Mitigation":"Implementing IoT-based environmental monitoring and control systems","Technologies":"IoT sensors, automated control systems","People":"Workplace employees, facility managers","Owner":"Businesses, facility management companies"},{"Description":"Limited awareness and compliance with safety guidelines","Impact":"Higher risk of Covid-19 transmission due to lack of knowledge and adherence","Mitigation":"Utilizing IoT for real-time communication and monitoring of safety compliance","Technologies":"IoT-enabled communication devices, remote monitoring systems","People":"General public, employees, management teams","Owner":"Health organizations, employers"}]}
